text: A leash or lead is a strap used to control the movement of an animal,. It is normally connected to a collar, harness or halter to control a pet, Leashes are commonly used on dogs during walks and other times when the pet is outside the owner's home or property. It is used to make sure the animal does not wander away from its owner. A leash can also be used on toddlers and other small children to prevent them from wandering away from their parents or guardians during outings. Category:Tools Category:Animal husbandry
title: Leash
